reviews.review_msg: Jenny is truly a wonderful professor. She is extremely engaging and passionate, which made coming to class exciting. The readings and material were refreshing and interesting, definitely relatable to the course. Jenny has been one one my favourite professors at SFU and reminds me why I chose Sociology in the first place.

Jenny is such a great instructor! She is so engaging and passionate about the subject that she teaches. The readings assigned may be much but are always valuable and relevant to the subject. She is such a genuine and intelligent person making her classes that much more amazing! Highly recommend taking her classes!

Jenny is an amazing professor that cares about the material and the students. The lectures are relevant and easy to follow. The readings are easy to do and not too onerous. She is an incredibly fair marker, gives insightful feedback, and is fast to return your work. Honestly couldn't ask for a better prof, you definitely need to take her class!

Jenny is great! She is passionate about anthropology and strives to stay engaged with her students. I would highly recommend taking a class with her, especially if you are new to anthropology! She's a fair marker and makes her expectations very clear and she's always available and happy to help students if needed. Participation is vert important.
